metadata.title: Yodo 3-Way Kids Suitcase Luggage or Toddler Rolling Backpack with wheels
features: 3-Way Playful Luggage for Kids - a Hand Bag, a Luggage or a Backpack? Just anyway you want. Multifuntional Design makes it grow with toddler for years. You can use it as a little diaper bag, travel lugage or shcool bag.

Spacious Compartment with Zip Pocket inside - Measures 11.8 x 6.1 x 15 inches, LARGE enough for Daycare or Weekend Trip to grandma's house, even idea for Long Plane Trip or International Travel - Your girl or boy would be glad to pack her/his bear,toys,books,blanket,clothes,kindle or ipad. Two zips allow kids to Open by Two Directions

Padded Front Pouch - Large Pouch for Quick Access to Snack,Toys or other Favorates. Handy Mesh Pockets at two sides - Hold Bottles, Shoes, Snacks or other essentials. Playful lids makes travel time so Joyful.
Additional Thick Padded Panel at Back Side - Easily Hide the Shoulder Strap when you only want Luggage. Hide-away Wheel Cover with Elastic - Prevent from being stained when you use it as Backpack.

Let's Play It - Kids love to play, whenever it's possible. We design our Luggage Backpack to be playful with animal feet, ears for any moment to come. Kids enjoy travel so let's make their travel time enjoyable! They will love to pull their own luggage like a little traveller.
description: Storefront Link: www.amazon.com/shops/yodo-group
What is 3-way Luggage?

Traditional Luggage only has trolley and wheels. But when the ground or grass is too dirty or wet to pull the Luggage, we have to carry it by trolley. This is when the 3-way kids Luggage bag comes so handy.

Traditional Luggage only has trolley and wheels. But when the ground or grass is too dirty or wet to pull the Luggage, we have to carry it by trolley. This is when the 3-way kids Luggage bag comes so handy.
The backstraps could be hidden when you only want luggage.
The backstraps could be hidden when you only want luggage.
When you only want Backpack, the wheels could be protected by storage bag at bottom with elastic binding.
When you only want Backpack, the wheels could be protected by storage bag at bottom with elastic binding.
Additional thick padding panel at back side to hidden the stiff trolley, and it will make you comfortable when you are using it as Backpack. How large is the bag?
Additional thick padding panel at back side to hidden the stiff trolley, and it will make you comfortable when you are using it as Backpack.
How large is the bag?
Large Size: 11.8 x 7 x 18 inches; Medium Size: 9.5 x 4.5 x 14.5 inches
Large Size: 11.8 x 7 x 18 inches; Medium Size: 9.5 x 4.5 x 14.5 inches
Front snack pouch is very large and it provides boys and girls or even moms, a quick access to other travel essentials.
Front snack pouch is very large and it provides boys and girls or even moms, a quick access to other travel essentials.
Mesh bottle pockets at two sides.
Mesh bottle pockets at two sides.
The bag can pretty much stands by itself. The design of each bag is different, and some of the animal design has tiny web feet at the bottom. How can I was this Luggage?
The bag can pretty much stands by itself. The design of each bag is different, and some of the animal design has tiny web feet at the bottom.
How can I was this Luggage?
Just wash with warm water and mild soap, by hand only, if necessary, us soft brushes. Safety Warning
Just wash with warm water and mild soap, by hand only, if necessary, us soft brushes.
Safety Warning
To avoid danger of suffocation, keep this bag away from babies and children.
To avoid danger of suffocation, keep this bag away from babies and children.
Keep this bag away from fire.
Keep this bag away from fire.
Do not use it in cribs, beds, carriages or play-pens.
Do not use it in cribs, beds, carriages or play-pens.
This bag is not a toy. Tear up bag before throwing away.
This bag is not a toy. Tear up bag before throwing away.
